channel.title: Firmware - what is the latest and how do I update?
channel.description:
Hi all. Small question - the Axoloti software says my devices firmware is 1.0.0.1 - is this the latest? If no, how do I update?
Thanks.

item.title: Firmware - what is the latest and how do I update?
item.dc:creator: @NamedUser
item.description:
@NamedUser wrote:

Hiya. Thanks but Iâ€™m not sure we are talking about the same thing (I am fairly new to this).

I have downloaded and am running in my Mac Axoloti 1.0.12-2.

However when I open the software and connect the Axoloti hardware by USB, the Axoloti terminal says my DEVICE firmware is 1.0.0.1.

  1. Is that the right device firmware?
  2. If not, how do I flash the updated firmware?

Thanks (and sorry for the rudimentary questions). I have flashed firmware on multiple Eurorack modules before but am finding this one a bit unclear.

Read full topic
item.source: Firmware - what is the latest and how do I update?

item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Latest release is Axoloti-1.0.12-2.

you can find it here:

github.com

axoloti/axoloti

Sketching embedded digital audio. Contribute to axoloti/axoloti development by creating an account on GitHub.
